results.title: France panorama. [No. 73?/40]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Face the press - President Pompidou addresses press gallery. Renault to give shares in its company to its workers. France stands ready to do its duty in the Common Market. 2. Archers of the 20th century - targets at fixed distances and field events. 3. Modern pedagogie - 4.5 million French students return to their studies. Advanced organisation and presentation of text books - which are now fully illustrated; a reflection of modern graphic arts using offset photo-engraving. 4. La Grange aux automates - the automation bar at Rousseauville, an ancient village near Poms. Shows inside a mechanical toys “museum” - mechanical musicians (in miniature) and “people” in doll’s houses doing daily chores. 5. The arts - F. Warin and J. Balton segment on contemporary French painter called Moretti.
